body:
Comment 11 by **holmesjack234**: 
I was concerned that something got broken in my installation of go, so I
did a "cmp" of the "gofmt"s from the two machines, and they are the same.
 I thought something might be leftover from the old version of go, so did a
"whereis gofmt", but there is only one, and it is in the correct directory.
I did a sw_vers on my laptop, and it is the same as on my imac.  I have not
observed any other parts of the go system that does not work on my imac.

Jack
